## Possible Causes

- [ ] Pest damage (insects)
- [ ] Disease
- [ ] Nutrient deficiency
- [ ] Weather damage
- [ ] Herbicide drift
- [ ] Wildlife damage
- [ ] Unknown

## Urgency

- [ ] Monitor - Keep an eye on it
- [ ] Soon - Should investigate within the week
- [ ] Urgent - Spreading rapidly or threatening yield
- [ ] Emergency - Immediate action required

## Action Checklist

- [ ] Scouted affected area
- [ ] Identified cause
- [ ] Treatment plan determined
- [ ] Treatment applied (if needed)
- [ ] Follow-up inspection scheduled
